job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Company Description

At Revalize, we build the software and technology that powers sales of manufactured, complex products. Our customers rely on our software to select and sell everything from commercial ovens, to specialized pumps and valves, to grain elevators, and more. We are the global leader in sector-specific software solutions that help manufacturers optimize revenue operations through design applications, engineering simulations, product selection, CPQ, PIM, visualization, and data analytics.


Headquartered in Jacksonville, FL, we serve over 8,000 customers across the globe.

Revalize is a portfolio company of TA Associates.


Job Description

Are you an experienced software developer who is looking for a new opportunity with a stable, growing company? Would you love an opportunity to work as part of a collaborative team who values excellent customer service and a strong work ethic? This innovative software company is looking for a Programmer who will develop and maintain applications by evaluating client’s needs. This is a full-time position with excellent benefits located in Jacksonville, Florida.


Responsibilities

• Identify and analyze technical requirements

• Assist in establishing design standards, design patterns and best practices and follow them

• Develop and maintain high quality applications

• Create and maintain unit tests in order to ensure quality of code

• Answer questions for our Customer Support and Product Management teams


Qualifications

Required skills and abilities

• 4+ years of experience with Java

• 2+ year(s) of experience with APIs

• 1+ year(s) of experience with Spring

 

Desired skills that would make you an outstanding candidate:

• Mechanical Engineering background

• Experience with ERP and/or CRM integrations

• Experience with Angular or React

• Experience with SQL Server or PostgeSQL

 

Education

• Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent


Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines. If qualified, to complete your application you will be required to complete a behavioral and aptitude test to be sent out via email.
